data.text: @KesavarapuKumar Hello, we regret to hear this. We are getting it checked and get back to you with an update. ~Diyashi
@PradeepValekar Hello, could you share your registered mail id and contact details via DM so we may get it checked and do the needful. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@snehalisha Ma'am, it is allowed in both the baggage. However, please remove the battery before placing it in check-in baggage. ~Linda
@vivekkumar1608 Yes. ~Linda
@TANUK112199 We understand your disappointment. Could you please share your PNR via DM, so we may check and assist you. ~Diyashi
@DrRaulVinci We regret to hear this, sir. Could you please share your PNR via DM so we may get it checked. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@mitalishahh We regret the inconvenience caused, ma'am. We are getting this checked. Allow us some time to get back to you with an update. ~Diyashi
@TheWarnerBale Yes it is allowed, Mr Bale. However, if more in quantity, same needs to carried in check-in baggage. ~Linda
@dr_SubranilG Hello, Dr Ghosh, we regret the inconvenience, could you please share your PNR via DM so we may get it checked. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@annihalated Mr Sahu, an original student ID or a bonafide certificate is a must for student booking. Please visit https://t.co/34crlZ8jjb to know more. ~Linda

urls.title: Student Discount Flights - Upto 6% off and 10KG extra baggage | IndiGo
urls.description: IndiGo offer a great deal for students with special Student Discount, get upto 6% off on base fare and also get additional 10kg baggage allowance.

data.text: @SimranThakur1 Hello, as checked the flight got delayed due to poor weather conditions. We look forward to your understanding. ~Diyashi
@tksri100 We have duly noted your suggestion, sir. We shall review it. ~Diyashi
@emrishsaxena Mr Saxena, sorry to see this. Did you inform our airport team upon arrival? Please DM us in detail along with the PNR. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@AnshulRathi932 Mr Rathi, we regret the delay. As checked, the flight has pushed back from it's parking bay & will be airborne any moment. Further, we'll have your feedback shared with the concerned team for necessary review. ~Linda
@AnimalSachin Mr Niranjan, we regret the hassle! We've refunded the seat fee to the original mode of payment. ~Linda
@IndiGo6E Hello, as checked the flight the delayed due to bad weather. Hope you have  pleasant flight. ~Diyashi
@IndiGo6E Mr Majee, as checked the flight was delayed due to due to bad weather. It shall be departing soon. Hope you have a pleasant journey ~Diyashi

@loknathkona We understand your concern, it can be very tiring and stressful. Please be informed, the lifts comes under the airport infrastructure, however we have noted your suggestion. Hoping to provide smooth journey in future. ~Diyashi
@SimranThakur1 We regret the inconvenience caused. Allow us some time to get the concern checked. ~Diyashi
@MajeeDebranjan We regret the inconvenience caused, Mr Majee. We are getting this checked. Allow us some time to get back to you with an update. ~Diyashi
@tksri100 Hello, we wish to inform you, to avail free seats, you may opt for auto seat assignment during web check-in and seats will be assigned to you as per availability. ~Diyashi
@cooolguns Hello, we understand your disappointment.  Allow us some time to get it checked and get back to you with an update. ~Diyashi

@sachinpandey44 Mr Pandey, we regret to see this. We understand your disappointment. Could you please share your PNR via DM so we may check and assist you in the best possible way. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@piyushmittal354 Sir, you may visit https://t.co/wYHxw8XAyQ for more details.~ Nandita

urls.title: Ok to Board
urls.description: Effective 1 st February 2018 “OK To Board” message is not required for the following categories of travellers for travel to UAE (Dubai and Sharjah) and Doha Customers holding valid Resident Permit or passport stamped with Resident Visa Customers eligible for “Visa On Arrival” irrespective of nationality Customers travelling with a print-out of Business and Tourist e-Visa “Ok To Board” message is mandatory for the below categories All customers holding ECR (Immigration Check Required) passport All customers

data.text: @Shek_HAWAt Sir, we regret the trouble. We request you to share your PNR via DM so, we may check and assist you further.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@tgghy28 Hi, you can carry the battery in your cabin baggage and the toy car in your check-in baggage. Let us know if you have any queries. ~ Nandita

data.text: @Akashnonu Sir, we are concerned to know what went wrong. We request you to share your experience via DM so, we may look into it and assist you further.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@dhurr_sala Sir, we regret the delay. We try our best to fly on time. As checked the delay is due to the late arrival of the incoming aircraft. Now the flight will depart at 0815 hours. Our team is trying its best to get you to your destination ASAP. ~ Nandita
@k37389426 Sir, please know that CPML stands for a corporate or complementary meal only.~ Nandita

data.text: @rajmandalapu Sir, we regret the hassle. We request you to share your PNR via DM so, we may check and assist you further.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@sajithnairc Sir, we regret the trouble. We request you to share your PNR via DM so, we may share it with our concerned team to look into it.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@AmanOberoi55 Sir, we regret the inconvenience caused. We are highlighting this to our concerned team right away.~ Nandita

@ssagar1296 Our team is trying its best to get you to your destination ASAP. Further, your feedback is duly noted and will be shared with our concerned team for necessary review and action.~ Nandita(2/)

@ssagar1296 Sir, we regret the hassle. We do understand rude behaviour is not acceptable. Our staff is expected to be courteous at all times. As checked, the delay is due to the late arrival of the incoming aircraft.(1/2)

@IFTEAKHARALI Sir, we understand sudden changes to the gate number create a hassle for our customers. Please know, gate change comes under the concerned Airport Authority. However, we'll have your feedback shared with the relevant team for review.~ Nandita
@chaitalibroy Ma'am, this doesn't seem right. We request you to share your PNR via DM so, we may highlight this to our concerned team right away.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@naveen2028k Sir, we regret the delay. We request you to share your PNR via DM so, we may highlight this to our concerned team right away.~ Nandita  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@Deepend99629979 Sir, we regret to know that you missed your flight. We request you to share your PNR via DM. Meanwhile, you may reach out to airport staff for real-time assistance.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@drbhushan84 Mr Chaudhari, we're so glad that our Crew could make your flight one to remember, and will have your kind words shared with Kritika. We look forward to making more memories with you again in the future.~ Nandita

@Allaudidn Sir, thank you for the shoutout. We are glad to know that you're delighted with the hospitality of our team. Please DM us the PNR so we may pass on your kudos to our crew right away.~ Nandita

data.text: @NoorArman4 Hi, we regret the trouble. We are highlighting this with our concerned team right away. You may also reach out to our airport staff for real-time assistance.~ Nandita
@PriyamGhoshal Sir, small tripods are allowed in cabin baggage. Medium & large-sized tripods will go in check-in baggage.~ Nandita
@Juhi1033 Hi, we regret the delay. We are highlighting this to our concerned team right away.~ Nandita
@SumanthCN1 Hi, we regret to see you upset. We request you to share your PNR via DM so, we may check and assist you further.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@md_kamar_khan Mr Khan, please be informed anything left behind in the airport premises which is not under the purview of the airline is submitted to the Lost & Found dept. of the airport authority. We'd request you to connect with the concerned team to retrieve the same. ~Linda
@mourjo_sen Mr Sen, sorry for the wait. Please DM us your PNR so we can have your feedback shared with the concerned team right away. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@Bankdiary Hi, we regret the overhead bin congestion. Further, we'll have your feedback shared with the concerned right away for necessary review. We look forward to serving you better in the future. ~Linda
@NimaiPrasad5 Mr Prasad, face masks are no longer mandatory as per guidelines, however, we always advise our customers to have them on for their own safety and others around them. ~Yashica

@Pushkar15373235 Sir, please be informed check-in counter closes 60 minutes prior and the boarding gate closes 25 minutes prior to the departure. As the passenger reported late, our team could not accept you on the same flight. We request your understanding.~Shreya
@juhi9027 As per policy, only one piece of hand baggage along with a laptop bag or ladies purse in cabin luggage is allowed. You may also visit https://t.co/WmlYIMwrEp for details.  ~Shreya

urls.title: Baggage Allowance, IndiGo Baggage Allowance | IndiGo
urls.description: Get the detailed information on Indigo baggage allowance for your all domestic flights as well as international flights. Know the number and weight of baggage prices you are allowed to carry during your journey.

data.text: @iamRohan_12 Mr Patil, could you DM us your email and contact number as well so we can take a closer look into this? ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@arifpolitical Sir, sorry to know the temperature isn't effective for you. We'd request you get in touch with the inflight team so they can adjust the temperature. You might as well turn on the air vent right above your seat. ~Linda
@MTAHIR81158934 Hi, sorry to note your experience. Further, we shall highlight it to the catering team for necessary review which will help us in future enhancements. ~Linda

@aakashjaveri Mr Javeri, while we work hard to keep our flight clean and insect-free, hope you'll understand insects or mosquitoes cannot be completely guarded against. Further, we're sharing your feedback with the concerned team right away. ~Linda

@brajras Hi, our team tried connecting with you on the registered number however they couldn't get through. Could you please DM an alternate number so we may connect with you? ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@abhishekanand82 Mr Anand, this is certainly not how we want our customers to feel. We shall highlight this to the concerned team right away for necessary review. We look forward to serving you better the next time you travel with us. ~Linda

@Ratheesh_Kumar Sir, we believe our customer relations team has reverted to you via mail and resolved your query. We request you to revert on the same mail in case you require further clarification. ~Shreya
@travelshreya Ma'am, please DM the contact number so we may connect to assist. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@PiyushDeorey Mr Deorey, we try our best to keep the aircraft insect-free by regularly spraying disinfectants. We are sure that you will understand that entry of insects or flies cannot be completely guarded against. Did you reach out to our cabin crew? ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@palash17621 Sir, we believe our customer care team has assisted you in this regard. ~Linda
@sonamitra Ms Mitra, please DM us your PNR along with the contact number so we can connect with you ASAP. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@mgayas71 Mr Gayasuddin, please visit https://t.co/o9sWZe4v8U to know more in detail. ~Linda

urls.description: Get updated information on visa and passport requirements for the countries you are visiting.

data.text: @Sachina33819609 Mr Agarwal, we regret the experience. Our staff are expected to be courteous at all times. We will share your feedback with the concerned team right for necessary review. We look forward to serving you better in the near future. ~Linda

@abhisheksingh5 Mr Singh, we understand your concern as delays are equally painful for us. It is only under extreme uncontrollable situations we're compelled to make such changes in the schedule. The revised departure is 21:55 hrs. Please allow our team some time to expedite the process. ~Linda
@RoshankumarSaw5 Mr Saw, this is unfortunate. Please allow us some time to check further. ~Linda
@kshitiz21_6 We believe our baggage team has tried to deliver the baggage at Mumbai terminal 1 arrival however, you have declined to deliver it. ~Shreya
@mysticalmadeira We'll get it checked and revert you. ~Shreya
@Purvi1702 Ma'am, the flight stands cancelled for the said date. ~Linda

@GChopsfine Hi, being on time is what we strive for. However, given the nature of our operation, certain unanticipated schedule changes become inevitable & are beyond our control. We look forward to your kind understanding. ~Linda
@korfball Hi, it was our pleasure to have the team onboard with us. Wishing all the very best to the entire team. :) ~Linda
@murali_64 Sir, we're happy to assist you. #goindiGo ~Shreya
@pranshuvats Sir, we're on it and will get back soon with an update. ~Shreya
@MohanRTulluri Sir, please allow us some time to check. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@anuragmuskkan Mr Srivastava, please DM us your PNR so we can check & advise. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@vasudha777 Ms Jhunjhunwala, we understand how inconvenient it must have been without the baggage. We see the baggage has been delivered now. Once again, we regret the hassle & look forward to serving you better in the future. ~Linda
@MisterA38092348 Hi, thanks for bringing this to our notice. Please DM us your PNR so we can highlight it to the concerned team right away. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@hemant4sharma Sir, please DM the contact number so we may connect. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@GauravC68099954 However, our staff at the airport assisted you with re-accommodation at minimal charges. Do hope you understand. ~Shreya  2/2

@GauravC68099954 While we understand missing a flight is stressful, please know our boarding gate close 25mins before the scheduled departure. Since you reported at 1018hrs for a flight scheduled to depart at 1045hrs, our staff couldn't accept you on the same flight. 1/2
@Hrittika_kannu Ms Chakraborty, please DM us your concern in detail along with the PNR (if any). ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@kanishka111996 Ms Khandelwal, we understand delays can be really troublesome. The revised departure is 20:15 hrs. Please allow us some time while our team is trying to expedite the process. ~Linda
@eshitasolanki Ma'am, we understand your point and have taken note of your valuable feedback. We wish you'll have a better experience next time. ~Shreya

@Minni_Gupta5 Ms Gupta, we are here to assist you and regret the inconvenience you faced while reaching out to our team due to high volumes. Please share some more details on your concern with us over DM so we may offer our help at the earliest. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@banapinky7984 Mr Sahoo, we don't have direct flights on this route as of now. Please stay tuned to our official website & social media channels for new flight/route addition & for other latest updates. ~Linda

@The_Khwabida Ma'am, we believe our baggage crew got in touch with you and gave you an update on the situation. By tomorrow, the bag will have been delivered. Sincere apologies for the trouble. ~Shreya

@rkchiru Hi, we never wish to deliver such an experience to our customers and truly regret the inconvenience caused. Please DM us your PNR so we can take a closer look at this and connect with you. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@arsh_505 Mr Singh, we absolutely understand how inconvenient this must be and regret your recent experience. We request you to share your PNR with us on the DM box so we can take a closer look and offer assistance. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@DeekshaSaksena Ms Saksena, sorry to find you annoyed. Please DM your PNR for us to check & assist further. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@TheWarnerBale Mr Bale, dry snacks & food are allowed in cabin baggage, however, it has to be in limited quantity.  ~Linda
@Hind108108108 Hi, 07 kilos of free baggage allowance is given to infants, either in check-in or cabin baggage. ~Linda
@PrabhatNigamXHG Sir, we tried calling you again, however, the call went unanswered. Please DM us a good time to call you again. ~Prabh

@milankumarsing1 Mr Singh, we regret the experience. However, we see our baggage handling team is in touch with you in this regard. Please allow us some time while our team is working on your concern. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@amarprabhu417 We're sorry to see you let down. Our staff assessed you a fee because the free baggage allowance listed on your PNR was 15 kgs and you had additional 12 kgs of luggage. We hope you understand that our staff is required to follow the rules. ~Shreya
@TheSkandar Thank you for allowing us to connect with you again and we truly hope you'll soon give us another opportunity to restore your confidence in our services. ~Prabh  2/2
@TheSkandar Mr Shah, we regret the inconvenience caused owing to the unpleasant experience you had. We'd like to assure you that feedback has been relayed to our airport team.  1/2
@gaurav_bajpeyee We're happy to assist you! ~Shreya
@pushpaneja37 Mr Aneja, please visit https://t.co/o9sWZe52Ys for detailed information on this. ~Linda

data.text: @SunilDeepak04 Sir, we're getting it checked and will get back with an update soon. ~Shreya

@joyrajwaikhom Hi, we're not flying to the above destination as of now. Please stay tuned to our official website & social media channels for new flight/route addition & for other such latest updates. ~Linda

@Rajjain22912876 Sir, at IndiGo, all our pilots undergo rigorous training and go through periodic proficiency checks. At no point in time will they compromise on the safety of our customers. Nevertheless, your feedback is duly noted and we'll definitely look into this. ~Yashica
